metadata.title: CVE-2022-0605 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Webstore API in Google Chrome prior to 98.0.4758.102allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionand convinced a user to enage in specific user interaction to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
